page.title: 10Survey of Traffic
page.content: A number of people were interviewed and the following questions asked:_ 1.Do you think the new Prendergast By_pass is a good idea? Ans:_ 65% of people wished to have it; 35% disliked it. 2.Why ? Ans:_ Reasons for approval:_ 56% to remove congestion 28% to increase speed 12% to avoid shaking buildings 4% to avoid pollution Reasons for disapproval:_ 50% disappearing old buildings 30% loss of trade 20% longer route {CONCLUSION..It was noticeable that:_ ..people whose businesses were endangered were the chief critics of the scheme! ..people in favour were those who had to drive through Prendergast!!
